commitResults.messageBody:
Reformat existing codebase in IntelliJ IDEA automatically using the code
formatting configuration files.

Update `README.md` to include my own iP information.

Add `LICENSE.md` to specify that my iP is not an open source project (to
prevent others from copying my iP code to use in their own).

Add `CODEOWNERS` file to specify that I own my iP files.

Add `SECURITY.md` and `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md` files, lightly modified from
the existing GitHub repository templates.

Add project code formatting and linting configuration files.

Update existing codebase formatting, and project configuration and
documentation files.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(Level-0): rename chatbot from Duke to Kuro
commitResults.messageBody:
Rename all mentions of the chatbot to Kuro from the placeholder name
Duke, except for the section of README preserved from upstream.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(Level-0): add skeletal greet and quit methods
commitResults.messageBody:
Add basic greet and quit methods that just prints to the console the
respective messages.

Update the UI test case to new output, so that the test case passes.

Update chatbot name to Kuro from the placeholder name Duke.

Add initial skeletal version that greets the user and exits.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(Level-1): add command echo to Kuro
commitResults.messageBody:
Add ability for Kuro to echo commands passed to it after the greeting is
displayed. The `bye` command still prints the exit message without
changes.

Add ability for Kuro to echo commands typed in after greeting the user,
while keeping the `bye` command working as before.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(Level-2): add and list tasks for Kuro
commitResults.messageBody:
Add ability to add and read tasks for Kuro. Tasks are not saved after
program termination.

commitResults.messageTitle: test: update test to just exiting Kuro
commitResults.messageBody: Update the test input and expected output to quit on running Kuro.

Add ability to add and read tasks for Kuro. Tasks are not saved after
program termination.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(Level-3): add mark and unmark tasks as done
commitResults.messageBody:
Add mark and unmark tasks as done to Kuro. Marking multiple tasks in one
go is supported.

Add mark and unmark tasks as done to Kuro. Marking multiple tasks in one
go is supported.

commitResults.messageTitle: fix: add tasks with spaces in between
commitResults.messageBody:
Fix an issue where adding a task with spaces in between (e.g. a
sentence) causes only part of the task (up till the first space) to be
added.

Refactor the Java source files.

Add additional beginning newline and prompt symbol in chat with Kuro, so
that the input and output can be differentiated easier.

Fix adding task with spaces only adding the first word.

Refactor Java source files.

Update IntelliJ IDEA Java code arrangement grouping rules, and always
show missing `@Override` as warnings.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(Level-4): add task types and split to classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Add todo, deadline, and event task types to Kuro.

Refactor majority of the code to use OOP, splitting into many different
classes to handle the different parts of the program.

commitResults.messageTitle: test(Level-4): update to reflect latest behaviour
commitResults.messageBody:
Update the integration test to correctly reflect the latest program
features and output.

Add todo, deadline, and event task types to Kuro.

Refactor majority of the code to use OOP, splitting into many different
classes to handle the different parts of the program.

Update the integration test to correctly reflect the latest program
features and output.

Remove unnecessary inspection rules.

commitResults.messageTitle: style: align more closely with coding standard
commitResults.messageBody:
Remove unnecessary class name and `this` qualifiers.

Rename `Kuro.java` to `Main.java`, making the program entry point more
obvious.

Update error handling to make use of custom exceptions, instead of just
printing the error message to the console.

Update error handling code to use custom exceptions, instead of just
printing the error message to the console.

Update code style to better align with the course coding standard.

Update all Java classes to be in user-defined packages
(`arpa.home.yikjin.app.kuro.*`).

Update all Java classes to be in user-defined packages
(`arpa.home.yikjin.app.kuro.*`).

Add IntelliJ IDEA run configuration files.

Update `.gitignore` to not exclude some run configuration files.
Add support for deleting tasks from the list.
Add support for deleting tasks from the list.

Remove empty `package-info.java` files, as they do not contain any
documentation. They are there to suppress the warning messages of the
missing `package-info.java` documentation files, which should not be
suppressed if there are no documentation in the files anyway.
Update `branch-Level-7` branch to latest `master` commits.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(Level-7): add saving of tasks to file
commitResults.messageBody: Add saving and updating to an external file.
Add saving and updating of tasks to external data file.
